welcome_text:
🎉 DexCoyote Legends is a new generation crypto game on the TON blockchain-network.

📈 Each of your Claim or Mint occurs directly on the blockchain network, and payment for Gas forms the liquidity pool of the game token.

💎 All your NFTs are available for sale and exchange from day one, and as affiliate rewards you can earn TON, which will certainly go to your crypto wallet.

↗️ Explore all the features of DexCoyote Legends in the channel: @dexcoyote
